text: Eduard Oleksandrovych Piskun (; born 1 January 1967) is a former Ukrainian football player. His son Vladislav Piskun is also a professional footballer. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:People from Mariupol Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Olympik Kharkiv players Category:FC CSKA Kyiv players Category:FC Chayka Sevastopol players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:SC Tavriya Simferopol players Category:FC Naftovyk-Ukrnafta Okhtyrka players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Nyva Bershad players Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:FC Elektron Romny players Category:FC Systema-Boreks Borodianka players Category:FC Papirnyk Malyn players Category:Association football defenders
title: Eduard Piskun
